title: Cinematic Action Drums Music Pack
description: Collection of 25 Cinematic Action Music tracks.
longDescription:
Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?


 Action scenes in video games require music as the crucial element to reflect the urgency of the motion. This track is carefully designed to support fast-moving frames to be more pronounced, and punchy as possible. Let your audience feel the difference.


Potential use cases; action games, fps games, cinematic trailers, background music for video games, countdown teasers.


Ideal for passionate game developers, YouTubers, video editors, and gamers who need cinematic action music for their projects.


You can listen to the preview of the tracks here:

  • Epikton - Adrenaline Pump 1:30
  • Epikton - Apocalyptic Warriors 1:36
